00024 {

00031 bool SilentMedia::Codec::WavPack::init ( std::string inputFile ) {
00032    this -> dspDev = this -> ddata -> getDSPDev();
00033    std::cout << "WavPack: in init()" << std::endl;
00034    this -> fileName = inputFile;
00035 
00036    char * error = NULL;
00037    this -> wpc = WavpackOpenFileInput ( this -> fileName . c_str(), error, OPEN_WVC, 0 );
00038    if ( this -> wpc == NULL ) {
00039       std::cout << "Error in error WavpackOpenFileInput(): " << error << std::endl;
00040    }
00041 
00042    this -> fileSize = WavpackGetFileSize ( this -> wpc );
00043    this -> totalTime = WavpackGetNumSamples ( this -> wpc ) / WavpackGetSampleRate ( this -> wpc );
00044 
00045    this -> ddata -> setAudioParams ( this -> fileSize, this -> totalTime, WavpackGetNumChannels ( this -> wpc ), WavpackGetSampleRate ( this -> wpc ),
00046                              WavpackGetAverageBitrate ( this -> wpc, 0 ), WavpackGetBitsPerSample ( this -> wpc ) );
00047 //    this -> readVorbisComment();
00048 
00049    return 0;
00050 }
00051 
00052 void SilentMedia::Codec::WavPack::play ( void ) {
00053    std::cout << "WavPack: in play()" << std::endl;
00054    this -> playCheck = true;
00055 
00056    this -> buffer = new int32_t [ this -> bufSize ] ;
00057    this -> outputBuf = new int16_t [ this -> bufSize ];
00058 
00059    if ( this -> seekCheck == false ) {
00060       char * error = NULL;
00061       this -> pwpc = WavpackOpenFileInput ( this -> fileName . c_str(), error, OPEN_WVC, 0 );
00062       if ( this -> pwpc == NULL ) {
00063          std::cout << "Error in error WavpackOpenFileInput(): " << error << std::endl;
00064       }
00065    }
00066 
00067    this -> ddata -> setParam();
00068    while ( /*int samplesUnpacked =*/ WavpackUnpackSamples ( this -> pwpc, this -> buffer, 1024 ) ) {
00069       for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < this -> bufSize; ++i ) {
00070          this -> outputBuf [ i ] = this -> buffer [ i ];
00071       }
00072       write ( this -> dspDev, this -> outputBuf, this -> bufSize );
00073    }
00074    this -> releaseBuff();
00075 }
00076 
00077 void SilentMedia::Codec::WavPack::releaseBuff ( void ) {
00078    delete[] this -> buffer;
00079    delete[] this -> outputBuf;
00080 }
00081 
00082 void SilentMedia::Codec::WavPack::setSeekPos ( double seekPos ) {
00083    this -> seekCheck = true;
00084 
00085    if ( WavpackSeekSample ( this -> pwpc, ( ( WavpackGetNumSamples ( this -> pwpc ) ) * ( seekPos / 100 ) ) ) == false ) {
00086       std::cout << "Error in WavpackSeekSample()" << std::endl;
00087    }
00088 }
00089 
00090 unsigned long int SilentMedia::Codec::WavPack::getCurrSeekPos ( void ) const {
00091    if ( WavpackGetNumSamples ( this -> pwpc ) == 0 || ( WavpackGetSampleIndex ( this -> pwpc ) ) == 0 ) {
00092       return 0;
00093    } else {
00094       return ( 100 / ( static_cast < double > ( WavpackGetNumSamples ( this -> pwpc ) ) / WavpackGetSampleIndex ( this -> pwpc ) ) );
00095 
00096    }
00097 }

00099 void SilentMedia::Codec::WavPack::flush ( void ) {
00100    std::cout << "WavPack: in flush()" << std::endl;
00101 //    if ( this -> wpc != NULL ) {
00102 //       WavpackCloseFile ( this -> wpc );
00103 //    }
00104    if ( this -> pwpc != NULL ) {
00105       WavpackCloseFile ( this -> pwpc );
00106    }
00107 
00108    if ( this -> playCheck == true ) {
00109       this -> releaseBuff();
00110    }
00111    this -> seekCheck = false;
00112 }

00114 void SilentMedia::Codec::WavPack::finish ( void ) {
00115    std::cout << "WavPack: in finish()" << std::endl;
00116    WavpackCloseFile ( this -> wpc );
